section.title: Search Actions
section.p: The following search actions can be applied on named defines and are available from the Search submenu in the contextual menu of the current editor or from the Document References menu:
The following action is available from the contextual menu and the Document Schema XSL menu:

ul.li: Show Definition - Moves the cursor to the definition of the current element in the Relax NG (full syntax) schema.You can also use the shortcut on a reference to display its definition.
